WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS 18 THRU 25 MAY
   BY M/V BGP PIONEER IN AREA BOUND BY
   27-07.33S 046-02.61W, 27-46.22S 046-42.44W,
   27-48.54S 047-22.17W, 28-25.28S 047-25.37W,
   28-53.08S 048-01.45W, 29-59.77S 046-32.64W,
   28-38.40S 044-25.73W, 28-04.46S 044-07.59W,
   27-03.49S 045-48.00W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 26 MAY 21.
